data.title: IDENTIFY
questions: In this phase, define the issue that most needs to be managed.
Scan/monitor the environment for possible issues.
Prioritize issues with most significant potential impact.
Select and define the issue to be addressed.
Frame the issue as “How to most effectively respond to…”
Identify stakeholders potentially impacted by the issue.
Refine list to key stakeholders based on power/influence.
Ensure the framing satisfies key internal stakeholders.

data.title: SPECIFY
questions: In this phase, gather as much information as possible.
Share knowledge/background/research on the issue.
Identify subject matter experts and their positions.
Establish data-based trends and likely future states.
What external factors are driving this? How strongly?
What external factors are resisting this? How strongly?
Overall, what’s the current assessment of the issue?

data.title: GENERATE
questions: At this phase, explore all possibilities and scenarios related to the issue.
Generate scenarios of how the issue might grow/evolve.
Identify likely impacts on the organization/stakeholders.
Brainstorm ways to address/mitigate the impacts.
Envision the organization’s wanted outcome/resolution.
Imagine exactly how the issue should be resolved.
What was key to successfully navigating the issue?

data.title: EVALUATE
questions: In this phase, understand stakeholder concerns and opportunities to influence.
Determine stakeholders' needs, wants and/or concerns.
How might their input be incorporated in our approach?
Assess how the issue impacts different stakeholders (+/-).
What positions have stakeholders taken or likely to take?
Who are our Allies? Opponents? Fence-sitters? Unknowns?
What coalitions or alliances might we forge? With whom?
How might we influence stakeholders to our point of view?

data.title: RESPOND
questions: In this phase, develop a position/response to the issue.
Assess risks: probability of outcomes x impacts (+/-).
Prioritize most significant risks relative to the issue.
Develop an operations plan to address key internal risks.
Establish a corporate position/policy to address the issue.
Craft a communications plan to influence key stakeholders.
Develop FAQ; determine how to respond to media inquiries.
